actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Tort Claims Act to allow a U.S. citizen to bring a civil action against the United States on certain claims arising in foreign countries.

summary.text: Allows a United States citizen to bring a civil action under the Federal Tort Claims Act, against the United States on specified claims arising in foreign countries.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Tort Claims Act to allow a U.S. citizen to bring a civil action against the United States on certain claims arising in foreign countries.
